think_procedure: First, I looked up the function of the 'innodb_buffer_pool_chunk_size' knob in MySQL. I found that it is used to define the size of memory chunks within the InnoDB buffer pool. I then checked if this knob has any special values that would change its behavior or disable a feature. I found that it does not have any such special values. Therefore, I concluded that it is not a 'special' knob.
